channel.title: Direct X8 problems (Textures and white lines)
channel.description:
Hiya.
I´m playing in DX8 mode (Baddy graphics card are cool in 2012) and the game is playable and cool. But the problems is 1- A white line in the middle of the screen (Really really annoying 2- Missing Eye textures, green water (the toxic of the beggining) and Pistol (I don´t go too far, but maybe there are more textures) 3- Not a problem of DX8 but, The spanish translation have problems with á or ó. When you start a new chapter the words with that don´t show (But the subtitles don´t have this problem)
Any form to fix this without need to play in DX9?
Specs: Amd Phenom x3 2.1 3GB RAM ddr3 Nvidia 6150 Se Integrated
Screen of the problem (Sorry for no pistol) [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96099223[/url] Spanish Life
Thanks for the BM Team for making this, is one of the... No.. The most awesome work of the Time. You really need a medal And too for making the game works with DX8
If you see any mistake, please notify
